column4: when i installed kubuntu-desktop (and all its dependencies), i was prompted with a dialog box that asked to specify which display manager (gdm or kdm) i wanted to use. is there any way to get that dialog box again so i can change the display manager again?
just do 'sudo dpkg-reconfigure gdm'  or kdm if you want
arrenlex, colutti: so if i want gdm, i do sudo dpkg-reconfigure gdm; and if i want kdm, i do sudo dpkg-reconfigure kdm?
